patthana8.12:1.1_0: Nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.12:1.1_1: Nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.12:1.1_2: Nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokiyo ca nalokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.12:2.1_0: Nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.12:3.1_0: Nalokiyañca nalokuttarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.12:4.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
